p: Adult and egg mass counts were completed in selected blocks within 7 different vineyards in southeastern Pennsylvania. Vineyard block size varied with the smallest being 0.4 hectare and the largest 1.5 hectares. Blocks were often mixed cultivar plantings and varied in SLF infestation pressure. Adults were sampled between 16 and 27 Sept 2019 and egg masses were sampled from 7 to 16 Oct 2019. Within each block, vines were selected every 5Â m along each row and the total number of SLF adults and egg masses counted.
